irc._comment: Above option will limit amount of messages sent at the same time in order to avoid your account getting silenced if set to 'false'

_comment: Below you can change how a command is called in the chat and its description

commands.description: Create a multiplayer room with the specified name and send you an invite once the room is ready
Search for beatmaps and return the 5 first occurences
Return the download link for the requested beatmapId
Return the pp value for the requested beatmapId
From a multiplayer lobby previously created with createRoom, return the download link of the current beatmap
